mapper.select:
SELECT CST_KNM , PD_NM , CNTR_PD_STRTDT , UNRG_RSON_CD /* 자동이체통합미등록사유코드 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'AFTN_ITG_UNRG_RSON_CD', LPAD(UNRG_RSON_CD,2,'0')) AS UNRG_RSON /* 자동이체통합미등록사유 */ , DG_CNTR , DG_CNTR_NO , DG_CNTR_SN , DP_TP_CD , FNIT_APR_RS_CD , ACNO_ENCR , FNIT_RSG_FSH_DTM , BNK_NM , OWR_KNM , MPY_BSDT , BRYY_MMDD , SDING_CNTR_NO , SDING_CNTR_SN , SDING_DP_TP_CD , SDING_FNIT_APR_RS_CD , SDING_DG_CNTR_NO , SDING_BNK_NM , SDING_ACNO_ENCR , SDING_OWR_KNM , SDING_MPY_BSDT , SDING_BRYY_MMDD FROM ( SELECT CST_KNM , PD_NM , CNTR_PD_STRTDT , OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO AS DG_CNTR , OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO AS DG_CNTR_NO , OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN AS DG_CNTR_SN , CASE WHEN OJ_CNTR.DP_TP_CD != BASE_CNTR.DP_TP_CD THEN '1' /* 1. 이체구분값 상이 */ WHEN OJ_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0102' AND OJ_CNTR.ACNO_ENCR IS NULL THEN '2' /* 2. 계좌미등록(기기) */ WHEN OJ_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0203' AND OJ_CNTR.CRCDNO_ENCR IS NULL THEN '3' /* 3. 카드미등록(기기) */ WHEN OJ_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0102' AND (OJ_CNTR.FNIT_APR_RS_CD != 'Y' OR OJ_CNTR.FNIT_RSG_FSH_DTM = 'Y') THEN '12' /* 12. 계좌등록 오류 */ WHEN OJ_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0102' AND ( /* 4. 계좌정보 상이 */ OJ_CNTR.ACNO_ENCR != BASE_CNTR.ACNO_ENCR OR OJ_CNTR.OWR_KNM != BASE_CNTR.OWR_KNM OR OJ_CNTR.BNK_CD != BASE_CNTR.BNK_CD OR OJ_CNTR.MPY_BSDT != BASE_CNTR.MPY_BSDT ) THEN '4' WHEN OJ_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0203' AND ( /* 5. 카드정보 상이 */ OJ_CNTR.CDCO_CD != BASE_CNTR.CDCO_CD OR OJ_CNTR.CRCDNO_ENCR != BASE_CNTR.CRCDNO_ENCR OR OJ_CNTR.OWR_KNM != BASE_CNTR.OWR_KNM OR OJ_CNTR.CARD_EXPDT_YM != BASE_CNTR.CARD_EXPDT_YM OR OJ_CNTR.MPY_BSDT != BASE_CNTR.MPY_BSDT ) THEN '5' WHEN OJ_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0102' AND OJ_CNTR.ITG_BIL_OJ_ID IS NULL THEN '6' /* 6.묶음미등록(계좌-기기) */ WHEN OJ_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0203' AND OJ_CNTR.ITG_BIL_OJ_ID IS NULL THEN '7' /* 7.묶음출금미등록(카드-기기) */ WHEN BASE_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0102' AND BASE_CNTR.ITG_BIL_OJ_ID IS NULL THEN '8' /* 8.묶음미등록(계좌-모종) */ WHEN BASE_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0203' AND BASE_CNTR.ITG_BIL_OJ_ID IS NULL THEN '9' /* 9.묶음출금미등록(카드-모종) */ WHEN OJ_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0102' /* 10.대표코드상이(계좌묶음) */ AND (OJ_CNTR.DG_CNTR_NO || OJ_CNTR.DG_CNTR_SN != BASE_CNTR.DG_CNTR_NO || BASE_CNTR.DG_CNTR_SN ) THEN '10' WHEN OJ_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0203' /* 11.대표코드상이(카드묶음) */ AND (OJ_CNTR.DG_CNTR_NO || OJ_CNTR.DG_CNTR_SN != BASE_CNTR.DG_CNTR_NO || BASE_CNTR.DG_CNTR_SN ) THEN '11' END AS UNRG_RSON_CD , OJ_CNTR.DP_TP_CD , OJ_CNTR.FNIT_APR_RS_CD , CASE WHEN OJ_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0102' THEN OJ_CNTR.ACNO_ENCR ELSE OJ_CNTR.CRCDNO_ENCR END AS ACNO_ENCR , OJ_CNTR.FNIT_RSG_FSH_DTM , OJ_CNTR.BNK_NM , OJ_CNTR.OWR_KNM , OJ_CNTR.MPY_BSDT , OJ_CNTR.BRYY_MMDD , BASE_CNTR.CNTR_NO AS SDING_CNTR_NO , BASE_CNTR.CNTR_SN AS SDING_CNTR_SN , BASE_CNTR.DP_TP_CD AS SDING_DP_TP_CD , BASE_CNTR.FNIT_APR_RS_CD AS SDING_FNIT_APR_RS_CD , OJ_CNTR.OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO AS SDING_DG_CNTR_NO , BASE_CNTR.BNK_NM AS SDING_BNK_NM , CASE WHEN BASE_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0102' THEN BASE_CNTR.ACNO_ENCR ELSE BASE_CNTR.CRCDNO_ENCR END AS SDING_ACNO_ENCR , BASE_CNTR.OWR_KNM AS SDING_OWR_KNM , BASE_CNTR.MPY_BSDT AS SDING_MPY_BSDT , BASE_CNTR.BRYY_MMDD AS SDING_BRYY_MMDD FROM ( SELECT SCR.OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO , SCR.OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN , SCR.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO , SCR.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN , SCSB.DP_TP_CD , SCSB.ACNO_ENCR , SCSB.CRCDNO_ENCR , SCSB.FNIT_APR_RS_CD , SCSB.FNIT_RSG_FSH_DTM , SCSB.OWR_KNM , SCSB.BNK_CD , (SELECT FNIT_NM FROM TB_RVDW_FNIT_CD WHERE LPAD(CASE WHEN SCSB.DP_TP_CD = '0102' THEN SCSB.BNK_CD ELSE SCSB.CDCO_CD END ,3,0) = FNIT_CD) AS BNK_NM , SCSB.MPY_BSDT , SCSB.CDCO_CD , SCSB.CARD_EXPDT_YM , PPB.PD_NM , CCB.CST_KNM , SCD.CNTR_PD_STRTDT , SCSB.BRYY_MMDD , RI_OJ.ITG_BIL_OJ_ID , RI_OJ.DG_CNTR_NO , RI_OJ.DG_CNTR_SN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL SCR JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL SCD ON SCR.OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO = SCD.CNTR_NO AND SCR.OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN = SCD.CNTR_SN AND SCD.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SCD.SELL_TP_CD = '2' AND SCR.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '216' AND SCR.VL_END_DTM = '99991231235959' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN SCR.VL_STRT_DTM AND SCR.VL_END_DTM JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS SCB ON SCB.CNTR_NO = SCD.CNTR_NO AND SCB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SCB.CNTR_CAN_DTM IS NULL AND SCB.CNTR_CNFM_DTM >= '20200201' JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS CCB ON CCB.CST_NO = SCB.CNTR_CST_NO AND CCB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS PPB ON PPB.PD_CD = SCD.BASE_PD_CD AND PPB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_REL SCSR ON SCSR.DTL_CNTR_NO = SCD.CNTR_NO AND SCSR.DTL_CNTR_SN = SCD.CNTR_SN AND SCSR.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SCSR.VL_END_DTM = '99991231235959' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN SCSR.VL_STRT_DTM AND SCSR.VL_END_DTM JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS SCSB ON SCSB.CNTR_STLM_ID = SCSR.CNTR_STLM_ID AND SCSB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SCSB.DP_TP_CD IN ('0102','0203') LEFT JOIN TB_RVCL_ITG_BIL_OJ_BAS RI_OJ ON RI_OJ.SUBOD_CNTR_NO = SCR.OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO AND RI_OJ.SUBOD_CNTR_SN = SCR.OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN AND RI_OJ.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) OJ_CNTR JOIN LATERAL ( SELECT SCD.CNTR_NO , SCD.CNTR_SN , SCSB.DP_TP_CD , SCSB.ACNO_ENCR , SCSB.CRCDNO_ENCR , SCSB.FNIT_APR_RS_CD , SCSB.FNIT_RSG_FSH_DTM , SCSB.OWR_KNM , SCSB.BNK_CD , (SELECT FNIT_NM FROM TB_RVDW_FNIT_CD WHERE LPAD(CASE WHEN SCSB.DP_TP_CD = '0102' THEN SCSB.BNK_CD ELSE SCSB.CDCO_CD END ,3,0) = FNIT_CD) AS BNK_NM , SCSB.MPY_BSDT , SCSB.CDCO_CD , SCSB.CARD_EXPDT_YM , SCSB.BRYY_MMDD , RI_BA.ITG_BIL_OJ_ID , RI_BA.DG_CNTR_NO , RI_BA.DG_CNTR_SN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL SCD JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS SCB ON SCB.CNTR_NO = SCD.CNTR_NO AND SCB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SCB.CNTR_CAN_DTM IS NULL AND SCB.CNTR_CNFM_DTM >= '20200201' AND OJ_CNTR.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO = SCD.CNTR_NO AND OJ_CNTR.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN = SCD.CNTR_SN AND SCD.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SCD.SELL_TP_CD = '6' JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS CCB ON CCB.CST_NO = SCB.CNTR_CST_NO AND CCB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_REL SCSR ON SCSR.DTL_CNTR_NO = SCD.CNTR_NO AND SCSR.DTL_CNTR_SN = SCD.CNTR_SN AND SCSR.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SCSR.VL_END_DTM = '99991231235959' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN SCSR.VL_STRT_DTM AND SCSR.VL_END_DTM JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS SCSB ON SCSB.CNTR_STLM_ID = SCSR.CNTR_STLM_ID AND SCSB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SCSB.DP_TP_CD IN ('0102','0203') LEFT JOIN TB_RVCL_ITG_BIL_OJ_BAS RI_BA ON RI_BA.SUBOD_CNTR_NO = SCD.CNTR_NO AND RI_BA.SUBOD_CNTR_SN = SCD.CNTR_SN AND RI_BA.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) BASE_CNTR ON 1 = 1 WHERE ( OJ_CNTR.DP_TP_CD != BASE_CNTR.DP_TP_CD /* 1. 이체구분값 상이 */ OR ( OJ_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0102' AND OJ_CNTR.ACNO_ENCR IS NULL ) /* 2. 계좌미등록(기기) */ OR ( OJ_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0203' AND OJ_CNTR.CRCDNO_ENCR IS NULL ) /* 3. 카드미등록(기기) */ OR ( OJ_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0102' AND (OJ_CNTR.FNIT_APR_RS_CD != 'Y' OR OJ_CNTR.FNIT_RSG_FSH_DTM = 'Y') ) /* 12. 계좌등록오류(기기) */ OR ( OJ_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0102' AND ( /* 4. 계좌정보 상이 */ OJ_CNTR.ACNO_ENCR != BASE_CNTR.ACNO_ENCR OR OJ_CNTR.OWR_KNM != BASE_CNTR.OWR_KNM OR OJ_CNTR.BNK_CD != BASE_CNTR.BNK_CD OR OJ_CNTR.MPY_BSDT != BASE_CNTR.MPY_BSDT )) OR ( OJ_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0203' AND ( /* 5. 카드정보 상이 */ OJ_CNTR.CDCO_CD != BASE_CNTR.CDCO_CD OR OJ_CNTR.CRCDNO_ENCR != BASE_CNTR.CRCDNO_ENCR OR OJ_CNTR.OWR_KNM != BASE_CNTR.OWR_KNM OR OJ_CNTR.CARD_EXPDT_YM != BASE_CNTR.CARD_EXPDT_YM OR OJ_CNTR.MPY_BSDT != BASE_CNTR.MPY_BSDT )) OR ( OJ_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0102' AND OJ_CNTR.ITG_BIL_OJ_ID IS NULL ) /* 6.묶음미등록(계좌-기기) */ OR ( OJ_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0203' AND OJ_CNTR.ITG_BIL_OJ_ID IS NULL ) /* 7.묶음출금미등록(카드-기기) */ OR ( BASE_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0102' AND BASE_CNTR.ITG_BIL_OJ_ID IS NULL ) /* 8.묶음미등록(계좌-모종) */ OR ( BASE_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0203' AND BASE_CNTR.ITG_BIL_OJ_ID IS NULL ) /* 9.묶음출금미등록(카드-모종) */ OR ( OJ_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0102' /* 10.대표코드상이(계좌묶음) */ AND (OJ_CNTR.DG_CNTR_NO || OJ_CNTR.DG_CNTR_SN != BASE_CNTR.DG_CNTR_NO || BASE_CNTR.DG_CNTR_SN ) ) OR ( OJ_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0203' /* 11.대표코드상이(카드묶음) */ AND (OJ_CNTR.DG_CNTR_NO || OJ_CNTR.DG_CNTR_SN != BASE_CNTR.DG_CNTR_NO || BASE_CNTR.DG_CNTR_SN ) ) ) ) T WHERE 1 = 1
AND LPAD(T.UNRG_RSON_CD,2,'0') NOT IN ('02','03','12','13')
AND LPAD(T.UNRG_RSON_CD,2,'0') IN ('02','03','12','13')
AND T.DG_CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T.DG_CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}
AND T.CNTR_PD_STRTDT >= #{cntrPdStrtdt} || '000000'
AND T.CNTR_PD_STRTDT <= #{cntrPdEnddt} || '235999'

SELECT DG_CNTR.ITG_BIL_PRTC_DTM , DG_CNTR.FNL_MDFC_USR_ID , DG_CNTR.AFTN_ITG_UNRG_RS_CD , DG_CNTR.ERR_CN , DG_CNTR.CST_KNM , DG_CNTR.PD_NM , DG_CNTR.CNTR_PD_STRTDT , DG_CNTR.AFTN_ITG_UNRG_RSON_CD , DG_CNTR.DG_CNTR_NO AS CNTR_SN , DG_CNTR.DG_CNTR_NO AS DG_CNTR_NO , DG_CNTR.DG_CNTR_SN AS DG_CNTR_SN , DG_CNTR.DP_TP_CD , (SELECT FNIT_NM FROM TB_RVDW_FNIT_CD WHERE LPAD(CASE WHEN DG_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0102' THEN DG_CNTR.BNK_CD ELSE DG_CNTR.CDCO_CD END ,3,0) = FNIT_CD) AS BNK_CD , CASE WHEN DG_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0102' THEN DG_CNTR.ACNO_ENCR ELSE DG_CNTR.CRCDNO_ENCR END AS ACNO_ENCR , DG_CNTR.OWR_KNM , DG_CNTR.MPY_BSDT , DG_CNTR.BRYY_MMDD , SUBOD_CNTR.SUBOD_CNTR_NO AS SDING_CNTR_NO , SUBOD_CNTR.SUBOD_CNTR_SN AS SDING_CNTR_SN , SUBOD_CNTR.DP_TP_CD AS SDING_DP_TP_CD , DG_CNTR.DG_CNTR_NO AS SDING_DG_CNTR_SN , (SELECT FNIT_NM FROM TB_RVDW_FNIT_CD WHERE LPAD(CASE WHEN SUBOD_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0102' THEN SUBOD_CNTR.BNK_CD ELSE SUBOD_CNTR.CDCO_CD END,3,0) = FNIT_CD) AS SDING_BNK_CD , CASE WHEN SUBOD_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0102' THEN SUBOD_CNTR.ACNO_ENCR ELSE SUBOD_CNTR.CRCDNO_ENCR END AS SDING_ACNO_ENCR , SUBOD_CNTR.OWR_KNM AS SDING_OWR_KNM , SUBOD_CNTR.MPY_BSDT AS SDING_MPY_BSDT , SUBOD_CNTR.BRYY_MMDD AS SDING_BRYY_MMDD FROM ( SELECT RIBO.DG_CNTR_NO , RIBO.DG_CNTR_SN , RIBO.SUBOD_CNTR_NO , RIBO.SUBOD_CNTR_SN , SCSB.DP_TP_CD , SCSB.BNK_CD , SCSB.CDCO_CD , SCSB.ACNO_ENCR , SCSB.CRCDNO_ENCR , SCSB.OWR_KNM , SCSB.MPY_BSDT , RIBO.HIST_CH_DTM AS ITG_BIL_PRTC_DTM , RIBO.FNL_MDFC_USR_ID , '01' AS AFTN_ITG_UNRG_RS_CD , '' AS AFTN_ITG_UNRG_RSON_CD , '' AS ERR_CN , '' AS ERR_DG_CNTR_NO , '' AS ERR_DG_CNTR_SN , '' AS ERR_SUBOD_CNTR_NO , '' AS ERR_SUBOD_CNTR_SN , CCB.CST_KNM , PPB.PD_NM , SCD.CNTR_PD_STRTDT , CCB.BRYY_MMDD , SCD.SELL_TP_CD FROM TB_RVCL_ITG_BIL_OJ_HIST RIBO JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_REL SCSR ON RIBO.DG_CNTR_NO = SCSR.DTL_CNTR_NO AND RIBO.DG_CNTR_SN = SCSR.DTL_CNTR_SN AND RIBO.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND RIBO.FNT_DV_CD IN ('01','02') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN SCSR.VL_STRT_DTM AND SCSR.VL_END_DTM AND SCSR.VL_END_DTM = '99991231235959' JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS SCSB /* 계약결제기본 */ ON SCSR.CNTR_STLM_ID = SCSB.CNTR_STLM_ID AND SCSB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SCSR.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL SCD ON SCSR.DTL_CNTR_NO = SCD.CNTR_NO AND SCSR.DTL_CNTR_SN = SCD.CNTR_SN AND SCD.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS SCB ON SCB.CNTR_NO = SCD.CNTR_NO AND SCB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS CCB ON SCB.CNTR_CST_NO = CCB.CST_NO AND CCB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS PPB ON PPB.PD_CD = SCD.BASE_PD_CD AND PPB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND RIBO.HIST_CH_DTM BETWEEN #{cntrPdStrtdtA} || '000000' AND #{cntrPdEnddtA} || '235999' ) DG_CNTR JOIN ( SELECT RIBO.DG_CNTR_NO , RIBO.DG_CNTR_SN , RIBO.SUBOD_CNTR_NO , RIBO.SUBOD_CNTR_SN , SCSB.DP_TP_CD , SCSB.BNK_CD , SCSB.CDCO_CD , SCSB.ACNO_ENCR , SCSB.CRCDNO_ENCR , SCSB.OWR_KNM , SCSB.MPY_BSDT , RIBO.HIST_CH_DTM AS ITG_BIL_PRTC_DTM , RIBO.FNL_MDFC_USR_ID , '01' AS AFTN_ITG_UNRG_RS_CD , '' AS AFTN_ITG_UNRG_RSON_CD , '' AS ERR_CN , '' AS ERR_DG_CNTR_NO , '' AS ERR_DG_CNTR_SN , '' AS ERR_SUBOD_CNTR_NO , '' AS ERR_SUBOD_CNTR_SN , CCB.CST_KNM , PPB.PD_NM , SCD.CNTR_PD_STRTDT , CCB.BRYY_MMDD , SCD.SELL_TP_CD FROM TB_RVCL_ITG_BIL_OJ_HIST RIBO JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_REL SCSR ON RIBO.SUBOD_CNTR_NO = SCSR.DTL_CNTR_NO AND RIBO.SUBOD_CNTR_SN = SCSR.DTL_CNTR_SN AND RIBO.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND RIBO.FNT_DV_CD IN ('01','02') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN SCSR.VL_STRT_DTM AND SCSR.VL_END_DTM AND SCSR.VL_END_DTM = '99991231235959' JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS SCSB /* 계약결제기본 */ ON SCSR.CNTR_STLM_ID = SCSB.CNTR_STLM_ID AND SCSB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SCSR.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL SCD ON SCSR.DTL_CNTR_NO = SCD.CNTR_NO AND SCSR.DTL_CNTR_SN = SCD.CNTR_SN AND SCD.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS SCB ON SCB.CNTR_NO = SCD.CNTR_NO AND SCB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS CCB ON SCB.CNTR_CST_NO = CCB.CST_NO AND CCB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS PPB ON PPB.PD_CD = SCD.BASE_PD_CD AND PPB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND RIBO.HIST_CH_DTM BETWEEN #{cntrPdStrtdtA} || '000000' AND #{cntrPdEnddtA} || '235999' ) SUBOD_CNTR ON DG_CNTR.DG_CNTR_NO = SUBOD_CNTR.DG_CNTR_NO AND DG_CNTR.DG_CNTR_SN = SUBOD_CNTR.DG_CNTR_SN AND DG_CNTR.SELL_TP_CD = '2' AND SUBOD_CNTR.SELL_TP_CD = '6'
AND DG_CNTR.AFTN_ITG_UNRG_RS_CD = '01'
AND DG_CNTR.AFTN_ITG_UNRG_RS_CD = '02'
AND DG_CNTR.DG_CNTR_NO = #{cntrNoA} AND DG_CNTR.DG_CNTR_SN = #{cntrSnA}
UNION SELECT DG_CNTR.ITG_BIL_PRTC_DTM , DG_CNTR.FNL_MDFC_USR_ID , DG_CNTR.AFTN_ITG_UNRG_RS_CD , DG_CNTR.ERR_CN , DG_CNTR.CST_KNM , DG_CNTR.PD_NM , DG_CNTR.CNTR_PD_STRTDT , DG_CNTR.AFTN_ITG_UNRG_RSON_CD , DG_CNTR.DG_CNTR_NO AS CNTR_SN , DG_CNTR.DG_CNTR_NO AS DG_CNTR_NO , DG_CNTR.DG_CNTR_SN AS DG_CNTR_SN , DG_CNTR.DP_TP_CD , (SELECT FNIT_NM FROM TB_RVDW_FNIT_CD WHERE LPAD(CASE WHEN DG_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0102' THEN DG_CNTR.BNK_CD ELSE DG_CNTR.CDCO_CD END ,3,0) = FNIT_CD) AS BNK_CD , CASE WHEN DG_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0102' THEN DG_CNTR.ACNO_ENCR ELSE DG_CNTR.CRCDNO_ENCR END AS ACNO_ENCR , DG_CNTR.OWR_KNM , DG_CNTR.MPY_BSDT , DG_CNTR.BRYY_MMDD , SUBOD_CNTR.SUBOD_CNTR_NO AS SDING_CNTR_NO , SUBOD_CNTR.SUBOD_CNTR_SN AS SDING_CNTR_SN , SUBOD_CNTR.DP_TP_CD AS SDING_DP_TP_CD , DG_CNTR.DG_CNTR_NO AS SDING_DG_CNTR_SN , (SELECT FNIT_NM FROM TB_RVDW_FNIT_CD WHERE LPAD(CASE WHEN SUBOD_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0102' THEN SUBOD_CNTR.BNK_CD ELSE SUBOD_CNTR.CDCO_CD END,3,0) = FNIT_CD) AS SDING_BNK_CD , CASE WHEN SUBOD_CNTR.DP_TP_CD = '0102' THEN SUBOD_CNTR.ACNO_ENCR ELSE SUBOD_CNTR.CRCDNO_ENCR END AS SDING_ACNO_ENCR , SUBOD_CNTR.OWR_KNM AS SDING_OWR_KNM , SUBOD_CNTR.MPY_BSDT AS SDING_MPY_BSDT , SUBOD_CNTR.BRYY_MMDD AS SDING_BRYY_MMDD FROM ( SELECT RIBO.DG_CNTR_NO , RIBO.DG_CNTR_SN , RIBO.SUBOD_CNTR_NO , RIBO.SUBOD_CNTR_SN , SCSB.DP_TP_CD , SCSB.BNK_CD , SCSB.CDCO_CD , SCSB.ACNO_ENCR , SCSB.CRCDNO_ENCR , SCSB.OWR_KNM , SCSB.MPY_BSDT , RIBO.ITG_BIL_PRTC_DTM , RIBO.FNL_MDFC_USR_ID , RIBO.AFTN_ITG_UNRG_RS_CD , RIBO.AFTN_ITG_UNRG_RSON_CD , RIBO.ERR_CN , RIBO.DG_CNTR_NO AS ERR_DG_CNTR_NO , RIBO.DG_CNTR_SN AS ERR_DG_CNTR_SN , RIBO.SUBOD_CNTR_NO AS ERR_SUBOD_CNTR_NO , RIBO.SUBOD_CNTR_SN AS ERR_SUBOD_CNTR_SN , CCB.CST_KNM , PPB.PD_NM , SCD.CNTR_PD_STRTDT , CCB.BRYY_MMDD FROM TB_RVCL_ITG_BIL_OJ_ERR_IZ RIBO JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_REL SCSR ON RIBO.SUBOD_CNTR_NO = SCSR.DTL_CNTR_NO AND RIBO.SUBOD_CNTR_SN = SCSR.DTL_CNTR_SN AND RIBO.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN SCSR.VL_STRT_DTM AND SCSR.VL_END_DTM AND SCSR.VL_END_DTM = '99991231235959' JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS SCSB /* 계약결제기본 */ ON SCSR.CNTR_STLM_ID = SCSB.CNTR_STLM_ID AND SCSB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SCSR.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL SCD ON SCSR.DTL_CNTR_NO = SCD.CNTR_NO AND SCSR.DTL_CNTR_SN = SCD.CNTR_SN AND SCD.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS SCB ON SCB.CNTR_NO = SCD.CNTR_NO AND SCB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS CCB ON SCB.CNTR_CST_NO = CCB.CST_NO AND CCB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS PPB ON PPB.PD_CD = SCD.BASE_PD_CD AND PPB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND RIBO.ITG_BIL_PRTC_DTM BETWEEN #{cntrPdStrtdtA} || '000000' AND #{cntrPdEnddtA} || '235999' ) DG_CNTR JOIN ( SELECT RIBO.DG_CNTR_NO , RIBO.DG_CNTR_SN , RIBO.SUBOD_CNTR_NO , RIBO.SUBOD_CNTR_SN , SCSB.DP_TP_CD , SCSB.BNK_CD , SCSB.CDCO_CD , SCSB.ACNO_ENCR , SCSB.CRCDNO_ENCR , SCSB.OWR_KNM , SCSB.MPY_BSDT , RIBO.ITG_BIL_PRTC_DTM , RIBO.FNL_MDFC_USR_ID , RIBO.AFTN_ITG_UNRG_RS_CD , RIBO.AFTN_ITG_UNRG_RSON_CD , RIBO.ERR_CN , RIBO.DG_CNTR_NO AS ERR_DG_CNTR_NO , RIBO.DG_CNTR_SN AS ERR_DG_CNTR_SN , RIBO.SUBOD_CNTR_NO AS ERR_SUBOD_CNTR_NO , RIBO.SUBOD_CNTR_SN AS ERR_SUBOD_CNTR_SN , CCB.CST_KNM , PPB.PD_NM , SCD.CNTR_PD_STRTDT , CCB.BRYY_MMDD FROM TB_RVCL_ITG_BIL_OJ_ERR_IZ RIBO JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_REL SCSR ON RIBO.SUBOD_CNTR_NO = SCSR.DTL_CNTR_NO AND RIBO.SUBOD_CNTR_SN = SCSR.DTL_CNTR_SN AND RIBO.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN SCSR.VL_STRT_DTM AND SCSR.VL_END_DTM AND SCSR.VL_END_DTM = '99991231235959' JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS SCSB /* 계약결제기본 */ ON SCSR.CNTR_STLM_ID = SCSB.CNTR_STLM_ID AND SCSB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SCSR.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL SCD ON SCSR.DTL_CNTR_NO = SCD.CNTR_NO AND SCSR.DTL_CNTR_SN = SCD.CNTR_SN AND SCD.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS SCB ON SCB.CNTR_NO = SCD.CNTR_NO AND SCB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS CCB ON SCB.CNTR_CST_NO = CCB.CST_NO AND CCB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS PPB ON PPB.PD_CD = SCD.BASE_PD_CD AND PPB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND RIBO.ITG_BIL_PRTC_DTM BETWEEN #{cntrPdStrtdtA} || '000000' AND #{cntrPdEnddtA} || '235999' ) SUBOD_CNTR ON DG_CNTR.DG_CNTR_NO = SUBOD_CNTR.DG_CNTR_NO AND DG_CNTR.DG_CNTR_SN = SUBOD_CNTR.DG_CNTR_SN
AND DG_CNTR.AFTN_ITG_UNRG_RS_CD = '01'
AND DG_CNTR.AFTN_ITG_UNRG_RS_CD = '02'
AND DG_CNTR.DG_CNTR_NO = #{cntrNoA} AND DG_CNTR.DG_CNTR_SN = #{cntrSnA}
